argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_limelon | |- ( ( A e. B /\ Lim A ) -> A e. On ) |
| 2 |  | #P_r1fnon | |- R1 Fn On |
| 3 |  | #P_fndm | |- ( R1 Fn On -> dom R1 = On ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_ax-mp | |- dom R1 = On |
| 5 | 1, 4 | #P_syl6eleqr | |- ( ( A e. B /\ Lim A ) -> A e. dom R1 ) |
| 6 |  | #P_r1limg | |- ( ( A e. dom R1 /\ Lim A ) -> ( R1 ` A ) = U_ x e. A ( R1 ` x ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_sylancom | |- ( ( A e. B /\ Lim A ) -> ( R1 ` A ) = U_ x e. A ( R1 ` x ) ) |
